contentrichtext.text: {{Distinguish|Dellinger (disambiguation)}} '''Dillinger''' may refer to the following: ==People== *[[Dillinger (surname)]] * [[Dillinger (musician)]], reggae artist ==Films== *[[Dillinger (1945 film)|''Dillinger'' (1945 film)]], a film made about the life of the gangster John Dillinger *[[Dillinger (1973 film)|''Dillinger'' (1973 film)]], a film made about the life of the gangster John Dillinger *[[Dillinger (1991 film)|''Dillinger'' (1991 film)]], a film made about the life of the gangster John Dillinger *[[Public Enemies (2009 film)|''Public Enemies'' (2009 film)]], a film made about the life of the gangster John Dillinger *''[[The Lady in Red (1979 film)]]'', a film about Polly Hamilton, girlfriend of John Dillinger, who becomes involved with Dillinger in the last days of his life and the setup by [[Anna Sage]] to the FBI that caused Dillinger's downfall *[[Dillinger Is Dead|''Dillinger Is Dead'' (1969 film)]], drama directed by Marco Ferreri ==Others== * Dillinger, a thriller by author [[Jack Higgins]] * Dillinger, a Canadian hard rock band * [[The Dillinger Escape Plan]], a mathcore band * [[Dillinger Four]], a punk band * [[Dillinger HÃ¼tte]] - a German steel fabricator ==See also== * [[Dillinja]], reggae/drum and bass music producer {{disambig}}
